# Interface TextStreamIterationResult

Interface representing the result of a TextStream iteration.

interface TextStreamIterationResult {  
done: boolean;  
text?: string;  
}

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#common/data_types/common.TextStreamIterationResult))

Indicates if the stream is finished
